sentences.chinese: 今蒙氏，秦之大臣謀士也，而主欲一旦棄去之，臣竊以為不可。
sentences.literal: Now Meng clan, Qin ministers strategists, yet lord wishes once abandon them, minister secretly considers cannot.
sentences.idiomatic: Now the Meng clan are Qin's great ministers and strategists, yet Your Majesty wishes to suddenly abandon them. I secretly consider this inadvisable.

sentences.chinese: 臣聞輕慮者不可以治國，獨智者不可以存君。
sentences.literal: Minister heard light consideration cannot govern state, sole wisdom cannot preserve lord.
sentences.idiomatic: I have heard that one who acts with superficial consideration cannot govern the state, and one who relies solely on his own wisdom cannot preserve his lord.

sentences.chinese: 誅殺忠臣而立無節行之人，是內使群臣不相信而外使鬬士之意離也，臣竊以為不可。」
sentences.literal: Execute kill loyal ministers establish without restraint conduct persons, this inner makes ministers not trust each other outer makes fighting scholars intent separate, minister secretly considers cannot.'
sentences.idiomatic: Execute kill loyal ministers establish without restraint conduct persons, this inner makes ministers not trust each other outer makes fighting scholars intent separate, minister secretly considers cannot.'

sentences.chinese: 胡亥不聽。
sentences.literal: Hu Hai not listened.
sentences.idiomatic: Hu Hai not listened.

sentences.chinese: 而遣御史曲宮乘傳之代，令蒙毅曰：「先主欲立太子而卿難之。
sentences.literal: Yet sent imperial secretary Qu Gong by relay to Dai, commanded Meng Yi: 'Previous lord wished establish crown prince yet you opposed.
sentences.idiomatic: Yet sent imperial secretary Qu Gong by relay to Dai, commanded Meng Yi: 'Previous lord wished establish crown prince yet you opposed.

sentences.chinese: 今丞相以卿為不忠，罪及其宗。
sentences.literal: Now chancellor considers you not loyal, crime reaches clan.
sentences.idiomatic: Now chancellor considers you not loyal, crime reaches clan.

sentences.chinese: 朕不忍，乃賜卿死，亦甚幸矣。
sentences.literal: I not bear, thus grant you die, also very fortunate.
sentences.idiomatic: I not bear, thus grant you die, also very fortunate.

sentences.chinese: 卿其圖之！」
sentences.literal: You consider it!'
sentences.idiomatic: You consider it!'

sentences.chinese: 毅對曰：「以臣不能得先主之意，則臣少宦，順幸沒世。
sentences.literal: Yi replied: 'With minister cannot get previous lord intent, then minister young served, obediently favored to death.
sentences.idiomatic: Yi replied: 'With minister cannot get previous lord intent, then minister young served, obediently favored to death.

sentences.chinese: 可謂知意矣。
sentences.literal: Can call knew intent.
sentences.idiomatic: Can call knew intent.

sentences.chinese: 以臣不知太子之能，則太子獨從，周旋天下，去諸公子絕遠，臣無所疑矣。
sentences.literal: With minister not know crown prince ability, then crown prince alone followed, toured world, left various crown princes far distant, minister no doubt.
sentences.idiomatic: With minister not know crown prince ability, then crown prince alone followed, toured world, left various crown princes far distant, minister no doubt.

sentences.chinese: 夫先主之舉用太子，數年之積也，臣乃何言之敢諫，何慮之敢謀！
sentences.literal: Previous lord raised used crown prince, several years accumulation, minister how dared speak admonish, how dared plan consider!
sentences.idiomatic: Previous lord raised used crown prince, several years accumulation, minister how dared speak admonish, how dared plan consider!

sentences.chinese: 非敢飾辭以避死也，為羞累先主之名，願大夫為慮焉，使臣得死情實。
sentences.literal: Not dared adorn words avoid death, for ashamed burden previous lord name, wish sir consider, make minister get die true feelings.
sentences.idiomatic: Not dared adorn words avoid death, for ashamed burden previous lord name, wish sir consider, make minister get die true feelings.

sentences.chinese: 且夫順成全者，道之所貴也；
sentences.literal: Moreover complete perfect followers, way what valued;
sentences.idiomatic: Moreover complete perfect followers, way what valued;

sentences.chinese: 刑殺者，道之所卒也。
sentences.literal: Punish kill, way what end.
sentences.idiomatic: Punish kill, way what end.

sentences.chinese: 昔者秦穆公殺三良而死，罪百里奚而非其罪也，故立號曰『繆』。
sentences.literal: Former Qin Mu Gong killed three worthy died, blamed Baili Xi yet not his crime, thus established title 'Miu'.
sentences.idiomatic: Former Qin Mu Gong killed three worthy died, blamed Baili Xi yet not his crime, thus established title 'Miu'.

sentences.chinese: 昭襄王殺武安君白起。
sentences.literal: Zhao Wang killed Wu An Jun Bai Qi.
sentences.idiomatic: Zhao Wang killed Wu An Jun Bai Qi.

sentences.chinese: 楚平王殺伍奢。
sentences.literal: Chu Ping Wang killed Wu She.
sentences.idiomatic: Chu Ping Wang killed Wu She.

sentences.chinese: 吳王夫差殺伍子胥。
sentences.literal: Wu Wang Fu Cha killed Wu Zi Xu.
sentences.idiomatic: Wu Wang Fu Cha killed Wu Zi Xu.

sentences.chinese: 此四君者，皆為大失，而天下非之，以其君為不明，以是籍於諸侯。
sentences.literal: These four lords, all great loss, world condemned them, considered their lords not enlightened, thus ridiculed among feudal lords.
sentences.idiomatic: These four lords, all great loss, world condemned them, considered their lords not enlightened, thus ridiculed among feudal lords.

sentences.chinese: 故曰『用道治者不殺無罪，而罰不加於無辜』。
sentences.literal: Thus said 'use way govern not kill innocent, punish not add to guiltless'.
sentences.idiomatic: Thus said 'use way govern not kill innocent, punish not add to guiltless'.

sentences.chinese: 唯大夫留心！」
sentences.literal: Only sir attentive!'
sentences.idiomatic: Only sir attentive!'

sentences.chinese: 使者知胡亥之意，不聽蒙毅之言，遂殺之。
sentences.literal: Envoy knew Hu Hai intent, not listened Meng Yi words, thus killed him.
sentences.idiomatic: Envoy knew Hu Hai intent, not listened Meng Yi words, thus killed him.

sentences.chinese: 二世又遣使者之陽周，令蒙恬曰：「君之過多矣，而卿弟毅有大罪，法及內史。」
sentences.literal: Second Emperor again sent envoy to Yang Zhou, commanded Meng Tian: 'Lord errors many, yet your younger brother Yi has great crime, law reaches inner shi.'
sentences.idiomatic: Second Emperor again sent envoy to Yang Zhou, commanded Meng Tian: 'Lord errors many, yet your younger brother Yi has great crime, law reaches inner shi.'

sentences.chinese: 恬曰：「自吾先人，及至子孫，積功信於秦三世矣。
sentences.literal: Tian said: 'From my ancestors to sons grandsons, accumulated merit trust Qin three generations.
sentences.idiomatic: Tian said: 'From my ancestors to sons grandsons, accumulated merit trust Qin three generations.

sentences.chinese: 今臣將兵三十餘萬，身雖囚系，其勢足以倍畔，然自知必死而守義者，不敢辱先人之教，以不忘先主也。
sentences.literal: Now minister leads troops thirty plus thousand, body though imprisoned bound, situation sufficient rebel, yet self know must die guard righteousness, dare not disgrace ancestors teaching, not forget previous lord.
sentences.idiomatic: Now minister leads troops thirty plus thousand, body though imprisoned bound, situation sufficient rebel, yet self know must die guard righteousness, dare not disgrace ancestors teaching, not forget previous lord.

sentences.chinese: 昔周成王初立，未離襁緥周公旦負王以朝，卒定天下。
sentences.literal: Former Zhou Cheng Wang initial establish, not left swaddling Zhou Gong Dan carried king court, finally settled world.
sentences.idiomatic: Former Zhou Cheng Wang initial establish, not left swaddling Zhou Gong Dan carried king court, finally settled world.

sentences.chinese: 及成王有病甚殆，公旦自揃其爪以沈於河，曰：『王未有識，是旦執事。
sentences.literal: When Cheng Wang had illness very grave, Gong Dan self cut his fingernails sank river, said: 'King not have knowledge, this Dan manages affairs.
sentences.idiomatic: When Cheng Wang had illness very grave, Gong Dan self cut his fingernails sank river, said: 'King not have knowledge, this Dan manages affairs.

sentences.chinese: 有罪殃，旦受其不祥。』
sentences.literal: Have crime calamity, Dan receive not auspicious.'
sentences.idiomatic: Have crime calamity, Dan receive not auspicious.'

sentences.chinese: 乃書而藏之記府，可謂信矣。
sentences.literal: Then wrote stored record bureau, can call trustworthy.
sentences.idiomatic: Then wrote stored record bureau, can call trustworthy.

sentences.chinese: 及王能治國，有賊臣言：『周公旦欲為亂久矣，王若不備，必有大事。』
sentences.literal: When king could govern state, had thief minister spoke: 'Zhou Gong Dan wished chaos long, king if not prepare, must have great affair.'
sentences.idiomatic: When king could govern state, had thief minister spoke: 'Zhou Gong Dan wished chaos long, king if not prepare, must have great affair.'

sentences.chinese: 王乃大怒，周公旦走而奔於楚。
sentences.literal: King then greatly angered, Zhou Gong Dan fled ran to Chu.
sentences.idiomatic: King then greatly angered, Zhou Gong Dan fled ran to Chu.

sentences.chinese: 成王觀於記府，得周公旦沈書，乃流涕曰：『孰謂周公旦欲為亂乎！』
sentences.literal: Cheng Wang viewed record bureau, got Zhou Gong Dan sank writing, then flowed tears said: 'Who said Zhou Gong Dan wished chaos!'
sentences.idiomatic: Cheng Wang viewed record bureau, got Zhou Gong Dan sank writing, then flowed tears said: 'Who said Zhou Gong Dan wished chaos!'

sentences.chinese: 殺言之者而反周公旦。
sentences.literal: Killed speaker returned Zhou Gong Dan.
sentences.idiomatic: Killed speaker returned Zhou Gong Dan.

sentences.chinese: 故《周書》曰『必參而伍之』。
sentences.literal: Thus Zhou Book said 'must check compare'.
sentences.idiomatic: Thus Zhou Book said 'must check compare'.

sentences.chinese: 今恬之宗，世無二心，而事卒如此，是必孽臣逆亂，內陵之道也。
sentences.literal: Now Tian clan, generations no two hearts, affairs finally like this, certainly evil ministers rebellious chaos, inner usurping way.
sentences.idiomatic: Now Tian clan, generations no two hearts, affairs finally like this, certainly evil ministers rebellious chaos, inner usurping way.

sentences.chinese: 夫成王失而復振則卒昌；
sentences.literal: Cheng Wang lost yet recovered then finally prospered;
sentences.idiomatic: Cheng Wang lost yet recovered then finally prospered;

sentences.chinese: 桀殺關龍逢，紂殺王子比干而不悔，身死則國亡。
sentences.literal: Jie killed Guan Long Feng, Zhou killed Wang Zi Bi Gan not regretted, body died then state perished.
sentences.idiomatic: Jie killed Guan Long Feng, Zhou killed Wang Zi Bi Gan not regretted, body died then state perished.

sentences.chinese: 臣故曰過可振而諫可覺也。
sentences.literal: Minister thus said error can recover admonish can awaken.
sentences.idiomatic: Minister thus said error can recover admonish can awaken.

sentences.chinese: 察於參伍，上聖之法也。
sentences.literal: Examine check compare, upper sage method.
sentences.idiomatic: Examine check compare, upper sage method.

sentences.chinese: 凡臣之言，非以求免於咎也，將以諫而死，願陛下為萬民思從道也。」
sentences.literal: All minister words, not to seek avoid blame, will admonish die, wish Your Majesty for myriad people consider follow way.'
sentences.idiomatic: All minister words, not to seek avoid blame, will admonish die, wish Your Majesty for myriad people consider follow way.'

sentences.chinese: 使者曰：「臣受詔行法於將軍，不敢以將軍言聞於上也。」
sentences.literal: Envoy said: 'Minister received decree execute law on general, dare not with general words hear above.'
sentences.idiomatic: Envoy said: 'Minister received decree execute law on general, dare not with general words hear above.'

sentences.chinese: 蒙恬喟然太息曰：「我何罪於天，無過而死乎？」
sentences.literal: Meng Tian sighed deeply: 'I what crime heaven, no error die?'
sentences.idiomatic: Meng Tian sighed deeply: 'I what crime heaven, no error die?'

sentences.chinese: 良久，徐曰：「恬罪固當死矣。
sentences.literal: Long time, slowly said: 'Tian crime certainly should die.
sentences.idiomatic: Long time, slowly said: 'Tian crime certainly should die.

sentences.chinese: 起臨洮屬之遼東，城塹萬餘里，此其中不能無絕地脈哉？
sentences.literal: Rose Lintao connected Liaodong, walled trenched ten thousand plus li, this among cannot no cut earth veins?
sentences.idiomatic: Rose Lintao connected Liaodong, walled trenched ten thousand plus li, this among cannot no cut earth veins?

sentences.chinese: 此乃恬之罪也。」
sentences.literal: This then Tian crime.'
sentences.idiomatic: This then Tian crime.'

sentences.chinese: 乃吞藥自殺。
sentences.literal: Thus swallowed medicine suicide.
sentences.idiomatic: Thus swallowed medicine suicide.

sentences.chinese: 太史公曰：吾適北邊，自直道歸，行觀蒙恬所為秦筑長城亭障，塹山堙谷，通直道，固輕百姓力矣。
sentences.literal: Grand Historian said: I went north border, from straight road returned, walked observed Meng Tian what for Qin built long wall beacon barriers, trenched mountains filled valleys, through straight road, indeed exhausted hundred surnames strength.
sentences.idiomatic: Grand Historian said: I went north border, from straight road returned, walked observed Meng Tian what for Qin built long wall beacon barriers, trenched mountains filled valleys, through straight road, indeed exhausted hundred surnames strength.

sentences.chinese: 夫秦之初滅諸侯，天下之心未定，痍傷者未瘳，而恬為名將，不以此時彊諫，振百姓之急，養老存孤，務修眾庶之和，而阿意興功，此其兄弟遇誅，不亦宜乎！
sentences.literal: Qin initial extinguished feudal lords, world heart not settled, wounded not healed, yet Tian as famous general, not with this time strong admonish, relieve hundred surnames urgency, nourish old store orphan, manage cultivate masses harmony, yet flattered intent raised merit, this his brothers met execution, not also suitable!
sentences.idiomatic: Qin initial extinguished feudal lords, world heart not settled, wounded not healed, yet Tian as famous general, not with this time strong admonish, relieve hundred surnames urgency, nourish old store orphan, manage cultivate masses harmony, yet flattered intent raised merit, this his brothers met execution, not also suitable!

sentences.chinese: 何乃罪地脈哉？
sentences.literal: Why then blame earth veins!
sentences.idiomatic: Why then blame earth veins!
